occurrenceSearch.description: Search for occurrences in Global Biodiversity Information Facility. Free and Open Access to Biodiversity Data.
occurrenceSearch.failedSearch: Your filters might be invalid or the servers having issues. Please try again and report the issue if it continues
occurrenceSearch.imageLicenseInfo: Be aware that licenses applied to images may differ from those applied to occurrence records
